<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using Pulumi;
using AzureNative = Pulumi.AzureNative;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var applicationDefinition = new AzureNative.Solutions.ApplicationDefinition("applicationDefinition", new()
    {
        ApplicationDefinitionName = "myManagedApplicationDef",
        Authorizations = new[]
        {
            new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationAuthorizationArgs
            {
                PrincipalId = "validprincipalguid",
                RoleDefinitionId = "validroleguid",
            },
        },
        Description = "myManagedApplicationDef description",
        DisplayName = "myManagedApplicationDef",
        LockLevel = AzureNative.Solutions.ApplicationLockLevel.None,
        PackageFileUri = "https://path/to/packagezipfile",
        ResourceGroupName = "rg",
    });

});


```

```go
package main

import (
	solutions "github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native-sdk/solutions/v2"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := solutions.NewApplicationDefinition(ctx, "applicationDefinition", &solutions.ApplicationDefinitionArgs{
			ApplicationDefinitionName: pulumi.String("myManagedApplicationDef"),
			Authorizations: solutions.ApplicationAuthorizationArray{
				&solutions.ApplicationAuthorizationArgs{
					PrincipalId:      pulumi.String("validprincipalguid"),
					RoleDefinitionId: pulumi.String("validroleguid"),
				},
			},
			Description:       pulumi.String("myManagedApplicationDef description"),
			DisplayName:       pulumi.String("myManagedApplicationDef"),
			LockLevel:         solutions.ApplicationLockLevelNone,
			PackageFileUri:    pulumi.String("https://path/to/packagezipfile"),
			ResourceGroupName: pulumi.String("rg"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.azurenative.solutions.ApplicationDefinition;
import com.pulumi.azurenative.solutions.ApplicationDefinitionArgs;
import com.pulumi.azurenative.solutions.inputs.ApplicationAuthorizationArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        var applicationDefinition = new ApplicationDefinition("applicationDefinition", ApplicationDefinitionArgs.builder()
            .applicationDefinitionName("myManagedApplicationDef")
            .authorizations(ApplicationAuthorizationArgs.builder()
                .principalId("validprincipalguid")
                .roleDefinitionId("validroleguid")
                .build())
            .description("myManagedApplicationDef description")
            .displayName("myManagedApplicationDef")
            .lockLevel("None")
            .packageFileUri("https://path/to/packagezipfile")
            .resourceGroupName("rg")
            .build());

    }
}
```

```csharp
var applicationDefinitionResource = new AzureNative.Solutions.ApplicationDefinition("applicationDefinitionResource", new()
{
    LockLevel = AzureNative.Solutions.ApplicationLockLevel.CanNotDelete,
    ResourceGroupName = "string",
    LockingPolicy = new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationPackageLockingPolicyDefinitionArgs
    {
        AllowedActions = new[]
        {
            "string",
        },
        AllowedDataActions = new[]
        {
            "string",
        },
    },
    MainTemplate = "any",
    DeploymentPolicy = new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationDeploymentPolicyArgs
    {
        DeploymentMode = "string",
    },
    Description = "string",
    DisplayName = "string",
    IsEnabled = false,
    Location = "string",
    Authorizations = new[]
    {
        new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationAuthorizationArgs
        {
            PrincipalId = "string",
            RoleDefinitionId = "string",
        },
    },
    ApplicationDefinitionName = "string",
    CreateUiDefinition = "any",
    ManagedBy = "string",
    ManagementPolicy = new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationManagementPolicyArgs
    {
        Mode = "string",
    },
    NotificationPolicy = new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationNotificationPolicyArgs
    {
        NotificationEndpoints = new[]
        {
            new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationNotificationEndpointArgs
            {
                Uri = "string",
            },
        },
    },
    PackageFileUri = "string",
    Policies = new[]
    {
        new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationPolicyArgs
        {
            Name = "string",
            Parameters = "string",
            PolicyDefinitionId = "string",
        },
    },
    Artifacts = new[]
    {
        new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.ApplicationDefinitionArtifactArgs
        {
            Name = "string",
            Type = AzureNative.Solutions.ApplicationArtifactType.NotSpecified,
            Uri = "string",
        },
    },
    Sku = new AzureNative.Solutions.Inputs.SkuArgs
    {
        Name = "string",
        Capacity = 0,
        Family = "string",
        Model = "string",
        Size = "string",
        Tier = "string",
    },
    StorageAccountId = "string",
    Tags = 
    {
        { "string", "string" },
    },
});
```

```go
example, err := solutions.NewApplicationDefinition(ctx, "applicationDefinitionResource", &solutions.ApplicationDefinitionArgs{
	LockLevel:         solutions.ApplicationLockLevelCanNotDelete,
	ResourceGroupName: pulumi.String("string"),
	LockingPolicy: &solutions.ApplicationPackageLockingPolicyDefinitionArgs{
		AllowedActions: pulumi.StringArray{
			pulumi.String("string"),
		},
		AllowedDataActions: pulumi.StringArray{
			pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
	MainTemplate: pulumi.Any("any"),
	DeploymentPolicy: &solutions.ApplicationDeploymentPolicyArgs{
		DeploymentMode: pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	Description: pulumi.String("string"),
	DisplayName: pulumi.String("string"),
	IsEnabled:   pulumi.Bool(false),
	Location:    pulumi.String("string"),
	Authorizations: solutions.ApplicationAuthorizationArray{
		&solutions.ApplicationAuthorizationArgs{
			PrincipalId:      pulumi.String("string"),
			RoleDefinitionId: pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
	ApplicationDefinitionName: pulumi.String("string"),
	CreateUiDefinition:        pulumi.Any("any"),
	ManagedBy:                 pulumi.String("string"),
	ManagementPolicy: &solutions.ApplicationManagementPolicyArgs{
		Mode: pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	NotificationPolicy: &solutions.ApplicationNotificationPolicyArgs{
		NotificationEndpoints: solutions.ApplicationNotificationEndpointArray{
			&solutions.ApplicationNotificationEndpointArgs{
				Uri: pulumi.String("string"),
			},
		},
	},
	PackageFileUri: pulumi.String("string"),
	Policies: solutions.ApplicationPolicyArray{
		&solutions.ApplicationPolicyArgs{
			Name:               pulumi.String("string"),
			Parameters:         pulumi.String("string"),
			PolicyDefinitionId: pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
	Artifacts: solutions.ApplicationDefinitionArtifactArray{
		&solutions.ApplicationDefinitionArtifactArgs{
			Name: pulumi.String("string"),
			Type: solutions.ApplicationArtifactTypeNotSpecified,
			Uri:  pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
	Sku: &solutions.SkuArgs{
		Name:     pulumi.String("string"),
		Capacity: pulumi.Int(0),
		Family:   pulumi.String("string"),
		Model:    pulumi.String("string"),
		Size:     pulumi.String("string"),
		Tier:     pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	StorageAccountId: pulumi.String("string"),
	Tags: pulumi.StringMap{
		"string": pulumi.String("string"),
	},
})
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

```java
var applicationDefinitionResource = new ApplicationDefinition("applicationDefinitionResource", ApplicationDefinitionArgs.builder()
    .lockLevel("CanNotDelete")
    .resourceGroupName("string")
    .lockingPolicy(ApplicationPackageLockingPolicyDefinitionArgs.builder()
        .allowedActions("string")
        .allowedDataActions("string")
        .build())
    .mainTemplate("any")
    .deploymentPolicy(ApplicationDeploymentPolicyArgs.builder()
        .deploymentMode("string")
        .build())
    .description("string")
    .displayName("string")
    .isEnabled(false)
    .location("string")
    .authorizations(ApplicationAuthorizationArgs.builder()
        .principalId("string")
        .roleDefinitionId("string")
        .build())
    .applicationDefinitionName("string")
    .createUiDefinition("any")
    .managedBy("string")
    .managementPolicy(ApplicationManagementPolicyArgs.builder()
        .mode("string")
        .build())
    .notificationPolicy(ApplicationNotificationPolicyArgs.builder()
        .notificationEndpoints(ApplicationNotificationEndpointArgs.builder()
            .uri("string")
            .build())
        .build())
    .packageFileUri("string")
    .policies(ApplicationPolicyArgs.builder()
        .name("string")
        .parameters("string")
        .policyDefinitionId("string")
        .build())
    .artifacts(ApplicationDefinitionArtifactArgs.builder()
        .name("string")
        .type("NotSpecified")
        .uri("string")
        .build())
    .sku(SkuArgs.builder()
        .name("string")
        .capacity(0)
        .family("string")
        .model("string")
        .size("string")
        .tier("string")
        .build())
    .storageAccountId("string")
    .tags(Map.of("string", "string"))
    .build());
```

## ApplicationDefinition Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">
<p>
In Python, inputs that are objects can be passed either as <a href="/docs/languages-sdks/python/#inputs-and-outputs">argument classes or as dictionary literals</a>.

The ApplicationDefinition resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:

## Import



An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:solutions:ApplicationDefinition myManagedApplicationDef /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Solutions/applicationDefinitions/{applicationDefinitionName} 
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).
